title: iPhone 13 Review: From Mini to Pro Max, It’s All About the Battery and Cameras
sub_head: Apple’s latest iPhones deliver in battery life, but some promised camera and video improvements fall short
body:
The time comes in every iPhone reviewer’s life: You launch the selfie camera, look deep into your own eyes and say, “You matter. This review matters. An in-depth analysis of this hunk of Apple -branded metal and glass matters.”
By the time this review of all four new iPhone 13 models hits, many will have already ordered one—or decided to sit this year out. My beautiful words, my hours of testing batteries and cameras, they won’t weigh into the decision. Heck, even my own editor ordered an iPhone 13 Pro last week.
